name: odata-query
description: OData v4 query builder that uses a simple object-based syntax similar to MongoDB and js-data
author: Sean Lynch <techniq35@gmail.com>

scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json & tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json & tsc -p tsconfig.dts.json & browserify -e src/index-browser.ts -p [ tsify ] -o dist/browser/index.js
